2072559117.author: Leth
2072559117.title: Lethamyr's Tetherball (tetherball.dll required)
2072559117.desc:
To play this map properly:
1. Change the file name extension to .upk instead of .udk (LethTetherball.upk should be the name)
2. Download the Tetherball.dll plugin (click "install with bakkesmod" and the plugin will run on start-up)
    - Plugin: 
https://bakkesplugins.com/plugins/view/101
3. Host the map through Bakkesmod Rocket Plugin
    - Check the box "Playing with custom maps"
    - Select LethTetherball.upk in the list
    - Give the mutator Unlimited Boost
4. For people connecting:
    - Open Rocket Plugin
    - Enter the host's direct ip
    - Check the box "joining a custom map" and select LethTetherball.upk in the list
    - Click join
How to set all this up: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vfIIa2cUZSE
Special thanks to glhglh and Cinderblock for helping with the map:
https://twitter.com/GlenHumphrey
https://twitter.com/CinderBlockCB
Enjoy the map <3

816596334.author: Hannah
816596334.title: Hannah's playground
816596334.desc:
Hannah's playground
Hey, this is one of the first maps I've done and I know it there are bugs in it and it looks unfinished but I thought I'm going to upload ist anyway! Don't expect a great map like "Obstacle Course 1" by French Frie or "Speed Race Map" by igresix. It's more like "test map"
My map's name "hannah's playground" was inspired by "TimsPlayground.upk" because it's neither a training map nor a racing map nor an arena.
Description: Platforms floating in the middle of nowhere. Some rings you can fly trough. A lot of flying is required to play this map. A lot of bugs are in this map. A lot of flying is required to play this map.
Special thanks to /u/whynotsteven who created the subreddit /r/RocketLeagueMods and made many usefull tools such as the RL Map Loader which made loading maps way faster.
And /u/ButterandCream0 who provided us helpfull guides for getting started with "Rocket-League-modding" and organizing all the information.
Also special thanks to /u/EpicEclipse who makes videos about Rocket League maps and was the first one to make me aware of custom Rl maps. He also made a weekly series about new maps which I really enjoyed.

1961205463.author: ALGO_RL
1961205463.title: Team Nytro Workshop Map -By Evan & Novel
1961205463.desc:
Thumbnail By Day
Join our Discord
[discord.gg]
 for additional help and to participate in our workshop events. We will be hosting the workshop map on Google servers so that anyone can join without the installation of Hamachi. Our Discord server will be the best place to find information regarding this. 
Common issues and solutions:
*Content ID mismatch: Check “Joining custom map” and then select NytroMap.udk
*Wrong password: In Rocket League go to host a local lobby and delete the password before hosting.
*Sky quality low: In Rocket League video settings change texture detail to high quality. 
*Missing textures: Download textures from the link below.
How to play with friends:
*Use 
BakkesMod
[bakkesmod.com]
 and the 
Rocket Plugin
[bakkesplugins.com]
 to swap the map and assign the mutators.
How to install plugins
*Use LogMein Hamachi to play with your friends. 
click here
[www.vpn.net]
*Get textures
click here
[rocketleaguemods.com]
Suggested Mutators(parkour) 
          *Parkour is meant to be done with default boost(unlimited does not work because the last level gives 
            you 100 boost)
          *Boost strength: 1x
          *Boost amount: Default
          *Respawn time: Disable goal reset
          *Match length: unlimited 
          *Demolish: Disabled 
Suggested mutators (stadium): 
          *Respawn time: Disable goal reset
          *Ball physics: Super light
          *Ball max speed: Super fast
          *Boost strength: 1.5x
          *Match Length: Unlimted
Speed run rules:
          *Runs done on servers will not count due to lag altering the stopwatch time. 
          *Runs will only count with boost amount set to default.
          *The 33 boost you receive at the beginning can be used.
          *Run will not count if you begin with more than 33 boost.
          *Boost strength should be set to 1x
          *You must go through all portals 
          *Runs will not count if you use unstuck as an exploit. 
 Links:
Team Nytro Discord
[discord.gg]
Team Nytro Youtube 
Novel's Youtube 
My Youtube

1198632568.author: Pastey
1198632568.title: Half Pipe
1198632568.desc:
A map for freestyling sk8terbois and the modded multiplayer community.
v2.5
- Fixed an issue where the ball wouldn't spawn with the Disable Goal Reset mutator
- The ball now spawns above ramps and drops on countdown. No more looking down at your car!
- Want to check out the skate park with friends? The Free Roam Easter Egg is now available during multiplayer matches (previously available during Free Play only). Hint: check the top of the map.
See changelog for more details.
This map is meant to be played with 2-8 players. See 
Rocket Launcher
[rocketleaguemods.com]
 instructions for how to setup multiplayer.
How to play:
Players start at the top. The ball starts at bottom of the ramp.
Land the ball on the opposing team's deck to score.
At 0 seconds, the ball has to land at the bottom of the ramp for the game to end.
There are boost pads but the effects don't work properly. At the top above the ramps is an invisible area where you can collect 100 boost every two seconds. As long as you're up there, your boost gauge should continue to refill.
Mutator suggestions to make this gamemode easier:
Low Ball Bounciness
Rumble,
Rumble (spikes only),
Low Gravity,
Moonball,
Pinball
Issues:
Boostpad effects don't work properly.
Upper boost area doesn't work properly if there's more than one player in it at a time
Celebration sequence is bugged.
Please post a comment if you find other issues. Thanks!

916532343.author: Derzo
916532343.title: [2-8 Players] Beach Volley
916532343.desc:
The one and only actual volleyball game mode in Rocket League
They should hire the person who made this, would be their first useful employee
 -Woofless
How to play with friends!
1. 
Download Rocket Launcher
2. 
Download and register to evolve 1.0
[www.evolvehq.com]
 It's a bit easier than hamachi and direct IP connection IMO
3. Create an evolve party and let your friends join it
4.  
Do this fix for evolve
5. (Optional) Go to Evolve Preferences by clicking the big button on top left corner, go to features and disable everything else than Party System. Evolve can be pretty annoying if you don't do that
6. Launch Rocket League
7. Launch Rocket Launcher
8. Go to Map Swapper tab in Rocket Launcher, hit Refresh and select BeachVolley (everyone has to do this)
9. Host a local lobby with the map set to underpass (Labs, not tokyo) and let your friends join that local lobby
Also note that if the host has downloaded any texture packages, everyone joining has to have them too. Otherwise you're going to get a package mismatch error when joining.
Recommended Mutators
Boost Amount: Unlimited

1872143687.title: GOI_StartersCup - v1.02 (Mesh fixes, bug fixes, QOL)
1872143687.desc:
The goal is to get the ball into the elevator at the top level. 
Prereqs:

Rules:

* For added challenge play with 'unlimited boost' off.

2142821184.author: FroYo
2142821184.title: Minigolf
2142821184.desc:
Another Minigolf map. 9 holes in total. Hole scored = next course
Single Player 
You are supposed to score on the red side. Just like in regular minigolf, your touches are being counted. The only difference: you are allowed to touch the ball while it is still moving. Some courses even require this second touch to properly get over the obstacle, like the loop for instance.
Known issues: 
Unfortunately I could not access the ingame  touch counter (if anyone knows, how to do this, please leave it in the comments below), so I had to come up with a semiperfect workaround, which works fine most of the time. 
Multiplayer 
It is supposed to be played like regular Rocket League. Blue team has to score on the red side and vice versa. You should increase the match length to 20 minutes or unlimited, if you want to play on every course. You will also need unlimited or recharging boost. Touch counter and scores are disabled in this mode (Unless you all join the blue team. Then the game starts in "single player mode" with scores and touch counter and you can play the courses cooperatively). 
How to play custom maps with your friends.
Have fun.
Update july 10th 2020:
Fixed the touch counter. Should be accurate now.

1287922725.author: Karl-Heinz Schneider
1287922725.title: [MP] RL Racing Royale - Alpha2.2
1287922725.desc:
Alpha 2 released! Check the Workshop description for Changelog and Update Instructions
-----
RL Racing Royale
 isn't just a single small Map, it is aiming to establish a 
new Gamemode
 into the Rocket Leauge universe: 
Multiplayer Racing
 - by mixing the best gameplay features from Rocket League and your favourite kart racing games!
Features:
 
 Multiplayer Racing with support for up to 10 Players
 
 completely custom ingame Menu and HUD with custom Scoreboard, Minimap and more!
 
 for now featuring one single race track (rc_Lake) for public testing, but more tracks comming very soon
 
 racing framework easily extendable, so other devs can integrate new tracks without the need to code (other than very very few basic Kismet nodes)
How to Play:
PSA: The map itself is not really playable without two extra steps!
Step 1:
 
Problem:
 The Framework uses Level Streaming to load in only the necessary files (-> only the active race track), but without (manual) changes RL will crash, because it cant find the track and its dependencies.
 
Solution:
		[Copy track files into  ...\*STEAM*\SteamApps\common\rocketleague\TAGame\CookedPCConsole by hand (-> extra HDD space needed)]
 
 
OR
 
		[create symbolic links in ...\*STEAM*\SteamApps\common\rocketleague\TAGame\CookedPCConsole to point to your workshop folder (where this mod will get dl'ed by steam: *STEAM*\SteamApps\workshop\content\252950\1287922725)(-> no extra HDD space needed)]
 
 
OR
 
 
(preferred) 
[use my [i]Install.bat[/i] inside the workshop folder (*STEAM*\SteamApps\workshop\content\252950\1287922725) to automatically create the above mentioned symbolic links. 
PSA: don't blindly execute the .bat if you don't trust my files/don't understand the code!
]
 
code from Install.bat
 
@ECHO OFF

:: // Switching from Workshop folder into RL main folder
cd....
cd..
cd..
cd..
cd..
cd %cd%\common\rocketleague\TAGame\CookedPCConsole
echo RL Folder: %cd%
echo ...

:: // calling "CreateRLFolderLink"(function) for each file needed (definition below)

call:CreateRLFolderLink RR_Assets_KHS.upk
call:CreateRLFolderLink RR_Assets_Lake.upk
call:CreateRLFolderLink RR_KHS_Mats.upk
call:CreateRLFolderLink RR_Prefabs_KHS.upk
call:CreateRLFolderLink RR_rc_lake.upk
call:CreateRLFolderLink RR_VersionInfo.upk


pause



:: // Function definition "CreateRLFolderLink"

:CreateRLFolderLink
:: // "%~1" = Filename passed by function call (from above)
echo File: %~1
:// Deleting old Link 
del %~1
:// Creating new Link; ("%~dp0" = folder, where the batch file is = workshop folder)
mklink /H %~1 "%~dp0\%~1"
echo ...


Step 2:
	for meaningful gameplay use 
Rocket Launcher
	recommended settings: unlimited  time, default boost
 
How to start a racetrack after loading up:
Only the Host can control the ingame Menu! Controlling it should be quite intuitive: use the same Gamepad(!) controls as RL to navigate (keyboard/mouse not really supported at this point)
To start a game navigate to 'Multiplayer' -> 'VSRace' -> select the first Cup -> select first Track -> loading screen will come up (yes, loading takes a few seconds even with SSD!) -> after loading you will get a prompt asking if you want to start the countdown
To reopen the menu press 'select' + 'right thumbstick' at the same time (default bindings of scoreboard and looking behind)
To restart the race just navigate through the menu again!
Menu Navigation slideshow
[imgur.com]
 
additional Information:
 
 this is the second alpha release, so bugs might (and will!) be found.
 
	more features will definitely come! this alpha is for a first  public game test to get feedback!
 
 I'm no artist, so the look is really basic! ^_^
 
Want to help develop this Gamemode?
Come to the RLMods discord and whisper KarlHeinzSchneider#1566 (I'm a Mod there!)
I'm looking for anyone interested, high demand on 2D artists for Menu/HUD art, and 3D artists for additional race tracks!
 
Error Codes:
 Error #1 - No Package installed | Necessary Packages not installed, see installation guide ("how to play") above!
 Error #2 - Wrong Package version installed. | Some Packages and/or old versions installed, please redo the installation as mentioned under "how to play"!

2143776633.author: Whifftastic
2143776633.title: Impossible Rings 2
2143776633.desc:
~ READ DESCRIPTION ~
 VIDEO GUIDE LINKED WITHIN THE PREVIEW PHOTOS ABOVE 
This is a very hard aerial challenge course for those who have mastered or wish to challenge their aerial control. There are 5 levels of increasing difficulty. There is also a short training course for those needing more practice and a level select for if you wish to try your luck on the next level. These rings are small, hard to maneuver and will put your car control to the test. 
Please watch the video linked above to gauge the skill level of this course.

Impossible Rings 2 [No Reset Version]:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2158336944
There is an issue with the resets when using the octane hitbox on level 5. I ran through one perfect run, then on my second back to back run I encountered one of these mystery resets. I spent 5 hours trying to figure out what was happening to no avail. The only thing I can do is apologize for any confusion or frustration and offer a guaranteed no reset version of the map for those having issues.

MUST HAVE TEXTURE PACK INSTALLED (Map still functions without it)
If you do not have the texture pack go to 
https://rocketleaguemods.com/mods/workshop-textures/
download the file and extract the files into c:\program files (x86)\steam\steamapps\common\rocketleague\tagame\cookedpcconsole

 $25 Steam Gift Card 
Reward for the FIRST person who completes a no death/reset, 100% run of levels 1-5 in under 6 minutes (360 seconds). Must link YouTube video with no transitions/filters (music is okay), with the end time clearly displayed after completion, in the comment section.
Kaokor - 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_uW9nvnVzZI

World Record Time Levels 1-5:
1) Kaokor - 4:50 [No Reset Version] 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_uW9nvnVzZI
2) Whifftastic - 5:58 [Original Version] 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p7QIFls6R80
3) N/A
World Record Practice Course Time:
1) Kaokor - 0:27 [No Reset Version] 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tJspEEaj0Jc&feature=youtu.be
World Record ??? Time:
1) N/A
Beat any of these times? Comment the link to your full run video from YouTube and have your video linked here!

Tips:
* If possible, after you bump in to a ring, let off the boost, adjust and then recover.
* The poles holding the rings up are purely cosmetic, you can pass through some of them while recovering.
* Your camera angle naturally falls slowly into the direction the nose of your car is pointing.
* Toggling on and off your ball cam will instantly snap the camera to the direction your nose is pointing.
* In level 5, a static halo indicates it is a warp ring (the course continues in the direction you were traveling).
* Don't panic when the camera angle changes on an upward/downward series of rings. Plan and be ready for when it does.
* Try to look ahead to see where you need to go next.
* The gravity is standard. Consider throttling the boost and/or boosting towards the next ring sooner while changing the momentum of your car.
* Some rings are less forgiving than others. Your best bet is to not touch any at all.
* Final times are displayed in seconds.
* If you are having trouble with a level, check out the video linked above of a complete run!

* In level 5, a static halo around a red ring indicates it is a warp ring (the course continues in the direction you were traveling).
* Don't panic when the camera angle changes on an upward/downward series of rings. Plan and be ready for when it does.
* Try to look ahead to see where you need to go next.
* The gravity is standard. Consider throttling the boost and/or boosting towards the next ring sooner while changing the momentum of your car.
* Some rings are less forgiving than others. Your best bet is to not touch any at all.
* Final times are displayed in seconds.
* If you are having trouble with a level, check out the video linked above of a complete run!

814146954.author: glhglh
814146954.title: Water Polo v1.0
814146954.desc:
Update by Lethamyr: 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1681397558&searchtext=water
A simple water polo map, with water!
NOTE: This was made for exibition, not for training so is currently not supported by the workshop update :( For now you can just try it out (if the ball doesn't spawn, use the ball reset). Also, support files are not working at the moment either, so sorry for the poor visuals!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Water Polo in Rocket League, with custom water physics!
Game Mechanics:
Boost refills constantly (slowly), but refills faster in the water.
Boost refills to 100% percent when hitting the water.
Boost is more powerful underwater. Walls are slightly less sticky under water.
Boost time for full boost is 20% longer, but only activates after the first goal (minor bug).
Dodge/jump resets when either entering or exiting the water. 
Dodge/jump reset timer is infinite so you can use your flip no matter how long you have been in the air.
Water Physics:
Max speed in the water is set to around 2000uu which is slightly below supersonic, but the boost is faster so you can enter supersonic the second you leave the water. It allows for much more control whilst in the water (to the point that I can dribble the ball in the water, and I am not even that good!).
'Water' is a gravity volume flipped upside down (650m/s, the opposite of RL gravity)
Whilst in the water, the velocity is reduced on the car in all directions by 2%, 20 times a second. This causes the drag (but I do need feedback on this!)
When the car enters the water, the angle of entry is calculated, converted to a percentage and applied to the velocity within some boundaries. Anything over a '80% perfect dive', so the middle 36°, will not affect the velocity. Anything below a '60% perfect dive', so the angles outside of the 54° range either side, will slow the car by 40% in the z-axis. The angles in between these values will use the percentage as a multiplier for the velocity so a '70% percent perfect dive' will slow the car by 30%. This works whether the nose of the back of the car enters first. (Sorry for the confusing description! Just ask if it is not clear).
This is my first map of any kind, so I would appreciate as much feedback as possible. 
Planned updates:
Tweak water - more drag? Slow rotation of ball (Thanks FerrumVulpes for the idea)
Add ball skipping/skimming
Boats...?
Known Bugs:
Spawns sometime put you on the wrong side
Boost length increase only activated after first goal.

1900626674.title: Racing - Circuit 23 (Updated to v1.01 lap system overhaul and lots other)

Use rocket plugin for multiplayer. Get it at:

* Test the track in training or play with up to 7 of your friends in a race to the finish. (Use Rocket Plugin from bakkes mod method mentioned by CodeGeek)

	** First to 3 laps will be crowned champ at the end on the winners platform. (Hopefully you like this)

* Added a reset trigger on some spikes.
* Added camera object to set starting view.
* Fixed some uv and textures on the dual tubes and other places.
* Fixed the boost trap fence showing duplicate mesh.
 
- To be done 
* Add option to turn off boost. 
* End game will be expanded on and ability to race again is a work in progress.
* Add dynamic physical meshes as obstacles.
* Add option to change the number of laps.
* Add timers for each players run.
* Still, visuals will be overhauled where necessary.
* Still, last section of the race may be revised and/or otherwise extended.
* Still, more traps like dynamic spikes, and gravity wells.
* Add more reset triggers where necessary.
* Any good feedback will be implemented where possible.

1767716809.author: Eeo
1767716809.title: Alexey's Compound Alpha
1767716809.desc:
Just like for any other Workshop map, if any textures are missing make sure to download the Workshop Texture pack and follow the instructions from: 
https://rocketleaguemods.com/mods/workshop-textures/
Type: obstacle course + ball park at the end
Difficulty: Beginner - Intermediate.
A non-punishing, beginner-friendly, advanced-oriented obstacle course. At the end you have the central court with the ball at your disposal. Perfect for the first thing you get in to warm up. Some flying then some ball chasing. Feel free to set the rules for yourself: "as many wall jumps as possible", or "no contact with constant air roll". Don't forget you can fly the map backwards for added variety.
Note, the map is not as bright as in the video. It's the default Win10 recorder that compresses the color range too much, making bright too bright.
To see the full beauty of the map don't forget to set the settings to max.
Shout-out to all Rocket League map makers and modders. I now feel your pain.
Psyonix & Epic, if you're reading this, please, oh please add better support for us, modders. If we can contribute to RL, the game will live forever. You can keep monopoly on items, but at the very least allow for easier map creation. I mean I've spent probably 6 hours just trying to figure materials and basically failed. I still couldn't create a material of my own, it just wouldn't load in the game. And the one we can re-use from the game engine, there isn't one that supports fully transparent alpha channel. And the blocking volumes! Don't get me started on that! Why do we need to have blocking volumes for every CSG element. I found a work around, but man it's painful. Before exporting I would create a brush the size of the map, intersect it with the geometry and then add one big blocking volume from that.
Time spent making: ~20 hours

1246337892.author: CoCo
1246337892.title: Green Screen Map (video editing tool)
1246337892.desc:
This map allows you to watch a replay with a green screen background.
 How to use it:
1st method (online replays):
Look for an online replay of your choice then replace the map file where your replay stands with the green screen map file. 
For example, if the map is "Beckwith Park (Midnight)", rename the green screen map file to "Park_Night_P.upk" 
/!\ don't forget to backup the original map file and make sure you won't play online with the green screen map because it could cost you a temp ban /!\
. 
Once the map is replaced you can load your online replay and it will be green screened.
2nd method (offline replays):
Replace the map file of your choice with the green screen map. 
Create a private match with a 1 goal score limit. Select the map that has been replaced, score a goal on the green screen map, save the replay then load the replay you just generated.
Link to the green screen map file:
   - 
https://www.dropbox.com/s/upx8402ba9hg39g/GreenScreenRL.zip?dl=0
You could also look for the map file in your steam workshop folder but this just makes it easier for you to get the file.
For a guided video of the above methods, you can check Zaphir's tutorials:
   - 
english version
 or 
french version
Special thanks to Derzo and Zaphir!

standalone SP Version of rc_Lake from RL Racing Royale - no installation steps needed!

Also i would like to see your best times! (complete race, and/or best roundtimes) The best racers will get custom titles for the MP version; just comment with a screenshot!
This Map is Singleplayer only! If you want to play it in Multiplayer, please check out the MP Version

PSA: This is the first standalone version, so it may contain bugs! please report if you find any, and i will fix them asap.

Thumbnail By TX
Join our Discord
[discord.gg]

How to play with friends:
*Use 
BakkesMod
[bakkesmod.com]
 and the 
Rocket Plugin
[bakkesplugins.com]
 to swap the map and assign the mutators.
How to install plugins
*Use 
Radmin
[www.radmin-vpn.com]
 to join a VPN with friends and play together. 
Mutators: 
          *Boost amount: Default
          *Respawn time: Disable goal reset
          *Match length: unlimited 
          *Demolish: Disabled 
Common issues and solutions:
*Content ID mismatch: Check “Joining custom map” and then select NytroMiniGames.udk
*Wrong password: In Rocket League go to host a local lobby and delete the password before hosting.
*Cannot connect: Host should turn off firewall for private networks. Remember to turn back on after!
*Sky quality low: In Rocket League video settings change texture detail to high quality.

2363050395.author: McShredder
2363050395.title: Spikeball Arena
2363050395.desc: This map is a Rocket League version of the game Spikeball. This game can be played with 2-6 players. The objective of the game is to score the most goals on the opposing team's goal. Both teams can utilize the trampoline in the center of the arena by either jumping on it or bouncing the ball off of it. In order to setup multiplayer, use the Rocket Plugin for Bakkes Mod. The game is meant to be played with unlimited boost and default mutator settings for everything else, but feel free to have fun with it. Tips: Use the center ramp to get in the air quickly from the ground while conserving a flip; Land on the trampoline with all 4 tires to get the best bounce and conserve a flip; Hit down on the ball into the trampoline to bounce it higher; Recover from falling quickly by boosting fast towards the trampoline.

1307013183.author: Pastey
1307013183.title: Tumble
1307013183.desc:
A multiplayer gamemode with map altering power-ups
v0.2 Alpha
This gamemode is still very much a work in progress. As of now, I'm not sure if I'll continue to add new features due to time constraints and UDK limitations. For now my focus will be to maintain this map as it is, so that means fixing bugs that have been introduced after a Rocket League update.
This map is meant to be played with 2-8 players. See 
Rocket Launcher
[rocketleaguemods.com]
 instructions for how to setup multiplayer.
What is Tumble?
Inspired by the popular Rumble mode in Rocket League, Tumble is a round-robin style gamemode in which players from opposing teams take turns activating power-ups. Power-ups can alter the map in many ways, from objects obstructing goals to moving obstacles that disrupt gameplay. After ten seconds, a player is selected to activate a power-up (indicated by the HUD on the lower left corner of the screen and an arrow above the player's car). They'll have ten seconds to pickup (drive/fly into) one three random power-ups spread throughout the map.
tl;dr it's like rumble, but for maps
What kinds of power-ups are there?
There are currently five power-ups available.
- The Wave: A hump that travels halfway across the map, launching anything that gets in its way.
- The Wall: A wall that travels halfway across the map, blocking the activator's goal and restricting gameplay to the opposing team's half.
- Pillars: Black rising pillars that partially obstruct the activator's goal.
- Dropshot: Like the name suggests, a hole is opened on the opposing team's side, allowing a goal to be score there.
- Hoops: Like the name suggests, a Hoops goal is activated on the activator's side. This one helps in that in blocks the default goal and makes it harder to score there, but also introduces the Hoops goal which can be harder to defend.
Issues:
- Boostpads not fully implemented
- Pickups sometimes overlap each other
- HUD doesn't always fully reset upon scoring a goal or reaching overtime
- Hoops power-up is still buggy
Please post a comment if you find other issues. Thanks!
Credits:
Major thanks to KarlHeinzSchneider for helping with multiplayer replication!
Derzo for helping with level streaming

2361010007.author: Simple Shark
2361010007.title: Domination: Remastered
2361010007.desc:
Welcome! 
Welcome to Rocket League Domination! Make sure to watch the How-to-Play Video above to see how the gameplay works, and about the Domination Tournament!
 Gameplay! 
Phase 1: Ball spawns at a random location around the map
Phase 2: A player grabs the ball and the scoreboard starts counting. First to 190 points wins!
Phase 3: Ball gets destroyed by either the other team taking it or a player is demoed.
Phases Repeat!
 Tournament 
A 3v3 tournament is happening on this map on 1/23. If you would like to learn details and to register, join the 
 Community Workshop Games Server!
[discord.gg]
 (Epic and Steam allowed.) Make sure to tell your friends about it! We want to bring more attention to community games and give everyone a chance to join!
 Mutators 
 Turn off Dynamic Shadows in Video Settings. Otherwise, your car will appear black for some reason
 Time Limit: Unlimited Time
 Max Score: 1 Goal
 Boost Amount: Unlimited
 Rumble: Spike Rush
 Respawn Time: 1 Second
 Fun Facts to beat your opponent 
 There are 9 total spawn locations. The ball will cycle through every single one before restarting the cycle.
 The No Gravity Room (The Wooden Egg) has shields on it, but these shields have nothing to do with scoring. They are just there for visual purposes
 There is an invisible ceiling above the bordering rock, and it will not destroy the ball
 There are 4 buildings on the map in which you can drive up the walls
 
 The 2 places with Black Hexagons
 
 The Middle Red Brick Building (The one with the lava)
 
 The No Gravity Room
 GLHF!

2282625994.author: Simple Shark
2282625994.title: The Maze (Now Completable)
2282625994.desc:
This was a map I made to challenge myself to make something in a weeekend. And it only took me a day and a half! So this map isn't as polished as some of the others, but I hope you can still have some fun! And yes... I took another couple days to really polish it, but I kept the original idea in tact.
Gameplay:
FOR PLAYERS
- If you're playing alone, I recommend taking the map with you, as soloing the maze is actually hard
- If you're playing with a friend, (JOIN THE SAME TEAM) you don't need the map and should be able to navigate through it easily as it's really easy to do it this way
BUG FIX
- If you are playing with a friend, the teleporting sometimes glitches, on the same team it might teleport all of you. The person who is going through the maze should switch teams and you should be fine.
BIRDS-EYE PLAYER
- Don't take the ball, that's there for the birds-eye view player
- For birds-eye view player, hit the white blocks in order to move the ball and see easier!
GLHF!

2380370578.author: Simple Shark
2380370578.title: Disadvantages: Where Plats beat SSLs
2380370578.desc:
Welcome to Rocket League Disadvantages, the place where lower leveled players can beat higher leveled players. You've seen those videos of "6 Plats vs. 1 Grand Champ". And this map is built around that premise! 
Gameplay:
Everyone who's on Orange will have a ton of disadvantages and everyone on Blue just plays normally. There are 10 Unique Events that can happen to Orange that will happen every 5 or so seconds. There is an extremely rare occurrence where something might not happen for some reason. Just rejoin teams and it'll fix itself. 
If you are the same rank, offset the teams. So 3v1 with 3 on orange or 2v1 with 2 on Orange etc.
Mutators: This is a standard map, but disabling demoes makes gameplay a lot more fun and a lot smoother. Don't worry I'll demo Orange plenty 
Demolition: Disabled
GLHF!

2347189620.author: gidek
2347189620.title: Among Us in Rocket League
2347189620.desc:
A fully working game of Among Us in Rocket League! 
Created by gidek & Lethamyr with the help of CinderBlock for the bakkesmod plugin.
Bakkesmod Plugin required to play:
 
https://bakkesplugins.com/plugins/view/166
How to Play Custom Maps with Friends: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vfIIa2cUZSE
What's in this map ?
Every aspects of the orignal Among Us game were remade for this map including:
- Tasks
- Votes
- Kills/Reports
- Sabotages
- Vents
- Cameras
- Settings
&more
Features :
- 
Camera View :
 The host can choose if you want to play with the Among Us bird's eye view or with the RL car camera in the settings.
- 
Spectator Mode :
 When a player a dies, his remaining tasks will auto-complete with a delay to simulate ghosts while he can enjoy watching the game and stealing Impostors strats :D
- 
Tactical Map :
 During Votes, you have the ability to open a map and place a pin point to give your position to other players. The reporting player can also select the dead body and place it on the map.
- 
Show Other Impostor On Map :
 This new setting can be set to <AdminMap>, impostors will see where their impostor mate is on the admin map. Also can be set to <Always> to display it on the basic blue map or <Never> like the original game.
How to play :
It is very recommended to play with your keyboard and mouse.
<Space> key is used for actions (ballcam default button)
<R> key to open the map (rumble default button)
Use your mouse to click on UI buttons and to complete tasks.
Rules are the same as in Among Us, you probably know them already but if you don't, go check some wikis!

tjbrother
https://twitch.tv/tjbrother
https://twitter.com/tjbrotherlive
https://discord.gg/rrzADAt
mugzrd
https://twitter.com/Mugzrd
https://discord.gg/JTdtUXg
Workshop Textures
https://rocketleaguemods.com/mods/workshop-textures/
-------------------------------------------------------------------
How to contribute
* Open map in UDK
* Define target orientations
* Send map to tjbrother
Let's say you want to create Firework (Melad remix) by Hollywood Principle.
In UDK, open Kismet.  Go to the sequence 'InitLists -> HollywoodPrincipleFireworkMeladBeats'.
In that sequence, every eighth note in the song has a specific target orientation.
There are 27 orientations. Make sure to use the correct prefix, in this case 'Firework'.
Orientations:
* FireworkNullPos
* FireworkStraightUpPos
* FireworkStraightDownPos
* FireworkUpNorthWestPos
* FireworkUpNorthPos
* FireworkUpNorthEastPos
* FireworkUpEastPos
* FireworkUpSouthEastPos
* FireworkUpSouthPos
* FireworkUpSouthWestPos
* FireworkUpWestPos
* FireworkLevelNorthWestPos
* FireworkLevelNorthPos
* FireworkLevelNorthEastPos
* FireworkLevelEastPos
* FireworkLevelSouthEastPos
* FireworkLevelSouthPos
* FireworkLevelSouthWestPos
* FireworkLevelWestPos
* FireworkDownNorthWestPos
* FireworkDownNorthPos
* FireworkDownNorthEastPos
* FireworkDownEastPos
* FireworkDownSouthEastPos
* FireworkDownSouthPos
* FireworkDownSouthWestPos
* FireworkDownWestPos
When you are done, send the map to me (tjbrother) via discord.  I will update the map and give you credit on the song's sign.
If you want to make a song that doesn't have a 'Help Wanted' sign, please ask.  I will update the map with the requested song.
This map only supports Rocket League songs.
Happy creating!

1419775459.author: gidek
1419775459.title: Hide And Seek #1 - by gidek (2-8 players)
1419775459.desc:
I spend hundreds of hours making maps for you guys without any benefits. I created a patreon so you can help me getting money out of it. If you like this map please consider a donation. 
 
https://www.patreon.com/gidek

~
Hi guys!
You want a fun game mode in Rocket League? You are at the right place!
I'm so proud to finally release this map after months of work. This is my participation to the JonSandman's mapping contest.
If you don't know how to play multiplayer maps, want to discuss with me or give me suggestions, come on the discord i made for this map : 
https://discord.gg/jtuyvK2
What's in this map?
- New Hide And Seek game mode
- New map entirely designed for this game mode
- Dynamic map
- Great features, Cold/Hot Indicator for seekers
- Fun for everyone, you don't need to be skilled to enjoy this map :)
- Finally a map where 4v4 makes sense
Rules :
I recommend you to play at least in 2v2, but 3v3 and 4v4 are for sure the best ways to go!
Teams can be unequal, 3v2, 1v4, everything is possible. (prefer more seekers than hiders)
- Blues are Seekers
- Oranges are Hiders
Seekers have to demolish all Hiders before the game ends to win!
Hiders will be slowed every 40 seconds, be careful when you are being chased.
The COLD/HOT feature will help you finding the way to your enemy when there are 2:30 minutes left on the clock.
When you die as Hider, switch to spectator mode so you can watch the game going and can't false the cold/hot indicator.
Mutators (very recommended) :
 
Max Score : 1 Goal
Boost Amount : Recharge (Fast) 
Demolish : On Contact
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I want to thank all my bros testers, who helped me getting the motivation i needed to work on this map, JonSandman for hosting this awesome contest and the modding community who helped me learning everything (Derzo your mapping guide is awesome :D)

2374180317.author: Simple Shark
2374180317.title: Deca-Ball
2374180317.desc:
Welcome to Rocket League Deca-Ball! Another battlegrounds-ish variation where you have to score in all 5 goals in order to win!
Gameplay:
Once the game starts, score in all 5 goals to get a point! You can track your progress with the in-game HUD in the bottom left. Blue scores on Orange and Orange scores on Blue. Once you score on a goal, a gate will close to show that that goal has been scored on. You have to actually put the ball in the goal in order to score, rolling it on the edge will do nothing. The Gates do not have collision. (I tried for months, and if they had collision it would drop your fps to 15)
Mutators:
- Turn off Dynamic Shadows in video settings
- Time Limit: Unlimited
- Max Score: 3 recommended (This dictates how long the game is)
- Boost Amount: Unlimited, OR Recharge for a challenge
GLHF!

1198375343.author: Derzo
1198375343.title: [2-8 Players] Booster-Rooster
1198375343.desc:
An early version of my racing map for the RL mods mapping contest
How to play with friends!
1. 
Download Rocket Launcher
2. 
Download and register to evolve 1.0
[www.evolvehq.com]
 It's a bit easier than hamachi and direct IP connection IMO
3. Create an evolve party and let your friends join it
4.  
Do this fix for evolve
5. (Optional) Go to Evolve Preferences by clicking the big button on top left corner, go to features and disable everything else than Party System. Evolve can be pretty annoying if you don't do that
6. Launch Rocket League
7. Launch Rocket Launcher
8. Go to Map Swapper tab in Rocket Launcher, hit Refresh and select BoosterRooster (everyone has to do this)
9. Host a local lobby with the map set to underpass (Labs, not tokyo) and let your friends join that local lobby
Also note that if the host has downloaded any texture packages, everyone joining has to have them too. Otherwise you're going to get a package mismatch error when joining.
Recommended Mutators
Match Length: Unlimited
Boost Amount: Unlimited

2298425323.author: Simple Shark
2298425323.title: SpiderBall
2298425323.desc:
Welcome! 
Welcome to the Hardsst game-mode on the Rocket League Workshop, which I call Spiderball! A game-mode with tons of tunnels and crazy paths! This is another version of battlegrounds, but instead of going back and forth, you can go side to side!
 Gameplay

2449133465.author: Simple Shark
2449133465.title: Racing Sumo
2449133465.desc:
Racing Sumo is a Sumo map in which you have to bump each other off on a race track! This Sumo map is unique because it will automatically tally up your score as you play!
Gameplay:
This map is a sumo map. The goal of a sumo map is to bump everyone else off the track and to be the last one standing! The thing unique about this sumo map is that it will automatically tally your teams score on the scoreboard! No need for the host to go into match admin and change everything. Once one team gets out, it checks how many people on the other team are still on the track. The more people alive, the more points you get. (If there's 2 people alive you get 2 points, if there's 3, you get 3 points, etc.) First team to reach the final score wins!
** IMPORTANT - READ BEFORE PLAYING **
- Everyone who's playing in the match must join (Spawn) before the countdown finishes. If you don't join in time, things won't work correctly.
- One you join, DO NOT switch teams. Only join once.
- Scoring can go two ways. Either you use unlimited time and do First to __. (11 or something like that). Or you do 10,20 minutes and most points at the end wins.
Mutators:
Time: Unlimited
Boost: Slow Recharge
Respawn Time: 1 second
Gravity: Low
Demolish: Disabled
Boost Strength: 10x
GLHF!

2467089255.title: The Top of the Donut
2467089255.desc:
Welcome to The Top of the Donut, The Donut's Evil Brother. The Donut has kept his brother locked away because he didn't want people to see it. But Today, The Evil Brother escapes and is here for you.
Gameplay:
The middle of the Map will propel the ball into the air and the outside of the map will also push the ball up into the cieling. For the middle of the map, the faster the ball hits the ground, the faster and higher it will go into the air.
Mutators:
Boost: Unlimited
Dynamic Shadows: Turn Shadows off in video settings. You can keep them on, but your car will appear much darker than usual.
GLHF!

2401873065.author: Simple Shark
2401873065.title: Cameras Everywhere!
2401873065.desc:
Welcome to Cameras! A game-mode that will set your camera around the map instead of behind your car!
Gameplay:
There are 9 cameras placed around the standard rocket league map. The game will start with a birds-eye-view and then rotate through the other views. At the beginning of every kickoff it resets at birds-eye view. In other words it's a set rotation, because it plays better this way. If someone gets demoed, their camera will be normal until the next cycle so be careful where you're going! 
Mutators: It's a standard map with working boost pads, but without unlimited boost it becomes 100x harder
Turn off Shadows in Video Settings, I will have it fixed for the next maps
- Unlimited Boost
GLHF!

2429306246.desc:

9 Levels with the 9th starring the pig king.

2447290818.author: Yoshilus
2447290818.title: Australian Bumperball League (ABL)
2447290818.desc:
AFL ..... IN ROCKET LEAGUE!
As an Aussie, my first map is that of our national sport. AFL!
I have created a map as close to the Australian Football League (AFL) (or as us Aussies like to call it, The Footy!) as possible. For those who don't know how our treasured sport is played, I will give a quick summary as this will help with gameplay.
 How is AFL/ABL played? 
 
The middle goal awards 6 points
 
The outer goals, a.k.a scoring a behind, awards 1 point
 
When a behind is scored against a team, they will start with the ball for the kickoff
 
A goal will start the kickoff in the centre of the field as usual
Mutators
 
Boost: Fast recharge 
or
 unlimited
 
Feel free to play with any other mutators
I'd like to give a massive shoutout to the awesome peeps at the 
RLMM Discord
[discord.com]
as well as 
Simple Shark
 for his fantastic video tutorial series!
Want to join a community of custom map players? Join the 
Community Workshop Games Discord
[discord.com]
Features to be added
 
Boostpads
 
Gridiron compatibility
Bug reports and suggestions are more than welcome!
Have fun!
P.S. GO THE HAWKS!

2442358440.author: Simple Shark
2442358440.title: We Were Here: RL Edition | A Co-op Puzzle Game
2442358440.desc:
Welcome to We Were Here in Rocket League! We Were Here is a cooperative puzzle game in which the two players have to work together in order to get to the end! And that's exactly what this is, just the puzzles are harder and incorporate Rocket League mechanics!
 Thank you to all the beta-testers 
Thank you to all the beta testers who helped me with this map! Without you, this wouldn't have been possible. Thank you to...
- Crysys_Beatbox
- SparrowHawk
- Naoki
- AshyLarry
- Jaevion
- Atomizer
- Whiffing Pro
- Mr. Swaggles
- Balanced Waffle
 Gameplay 
When you load into the game, you should be looking at a black screen. This is normal, and is done in order to give the map time to load. At the beginning of the game, you decide which role you would like to play, the librarian or the explorer. There can only be 2 people in the game, more than this or any spectators causes the map to break. The Explorer is blue and the Librarian is Orange. Both Players must work together in order to solve all of the puzzles and reach the end to discover 2 different endings and a bonus ending!
 Needed before starting 
There are a few things you need in order to run this map. You need both the 
 Workshop Textures 
[drive.google.com]
 and 
 Netcode Plugin 
[bakkesplugins.com]
. Without these, this map will not run.
 Mutators 
Turn off 
 Bloom 
 in Video Settings (Shadows are fine, but might make your car darker than usual). Most of the textures in this map were custom made, and with bloom on, it makes them hard to see.
Match Length: Unlimited
Boost: Unlimited
Demolish: Disabled
 READ BEFORE PLAYING 
There are a few things I need to mention before you get into the map so you're not confused.
- The map must be launched with Rocket Plugin, this is the only way NetCode works
- The doors don't have collision to prevent massive frame rate issues and sometimes you could go through them, so they will instead teleport you away from them.
- You can play this map multiple times. Every single sequence is randomized and has variations. A duplicate variation is purely coincidental.
- WARNING: You will not be able to save replays. Teleporting a player crashes the replays and this action is crucial to the workings of this map. Also, a replay over 30 minutes long tends to crash the game.
- If you want to replay this map, restart from kickoff in match admin doesn't work. You will need to make a new lobby
 ONLY HOVER OVER THE BLACK BAR IF YOU HAVE COMPLETED THE GAME 
The following is a spoiler: 
 In the ending cutscene, one of the lines is, "Was this sacrifice necessary?" The answer to that question is 
 no 
. There is a way to get both players through the gate at the end. 
 GLHF!

2489923276.author: gidek
2489923276.title: 1000€ Eversax's Dribble Challenge - made by gidek
2489923276.desc:
Hello and welcome to the 1000€ Eversax's Dribble Challenge - Made by gidek !
Here is the video explaining and presenting the map and the challenge : 
https://youtu.be/2zd_sw_Fd90
Here is the discord that you must join if you wanna participate to the challenge : 
https://discord.gg/KaZKkJZNep
Speedrun Challenge 100%
This challenge will be active until June 25th 2021. 750 € cashprize will be distributed at the end of the challenge. 500€ for the best time and 250€ for the second best time.
Rules
1 - Launch the map in the workshop menu on steam or launch it via the training mode on Epic Games. You can't launch it via Bakkesmod or with any mutators.
2 - Do your run with the Normal mode of the map
3 - The 20 levels of the map must be validated. You pass the level as you want but you can't pass from level 2 to level 4 for example.
4 - Use of Bakkesmod or directional arrows are strictly forbidden
5 - The timer must be present during the whole run and we must see the resume of the timer at the end of the run (it's a bunch of numbers)
6 - A run containing a bug or a glitch will not be taken into account. 
7 - To submit a run, you must either give the link of a VOD twitch with the VOD activated on your channel or upload a video on Youtube without any cut from the launch of the map to the end of the run.
8 - Runs can be submitted until June 25, 2021 at 11:59 pm
___
Impossible Challenge
This challenge will be active until someone finishes the map in impossible mode and the run is validated. The cashprize is 250€.
The rules are the same as the Speedrun Challenge 1,3,4,5,6,7, but you have to select the impossible mode and it must be shown on the VOD. 
Good luck and have fun :)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bonjour et bienvenue sur la map 1000€ Eversax's Dribble Challenge - Made by gidek.
 
Voici la vidéo expliquant et présentant les règles du challenge : 
https://youtu.be/2zd_sw_Fd90
Voici le discord à rejoindre obligatoirement pour participer au Challenge : 
https://discord.gg/KaZKkJZNep
Speedrun Challenge 100%
Ce challenge sera actif jusqu'au 25 juin 2021. 750 € de cashprize seront distribués à la fin du challenge. 500€ pour le meilleur temps et 250€ pour le deuxième meilleur temps.
Règles 
1 - Lancer la map dans le menu workshop sur steam où la lancer via le mode training sur EpicGames. Vous ne pouvez pas la lancer via Bakkesmod où avec quelconques mutateurs.
2 - Faire votre run dans le normal mode
3 - Les 20 niveaux de la map doivent être validés. Vous passez le niveau comme vous voulez mais vous ne pouvez pas passer du niveau 2 au niveau 4 par exemple.
4 - Utilisation de Bakkesmod où des flèches directionnelles interdites
5 - Le timer doit être présent durant toute la run et on doit voir le résumé des nombres  à la fin de la run
6 - Une run contenant un bug où un glitch ne sera pas prise en compte. 
7 - Pour soumettre une run, vous devez soit donner le lien d'une VOD twitch avec les VOD activées sur votre chaîne où upload une vidéo sur Youtube sans aucun cut du lancement de la map à la fin de la run.
8 - Des runs pourront être soumises jusqu'au 25 Juin 2021 à 23h59
___
Impossible Challenge
Ce challenge sera actif jusqu'au moment où quelqu'un aura fini la map en mode impossible et que la run sera validée. Le cashprize est de 250€
Les règles sont les mêmes que le point 1,3,4,5,6,7 du Speedrun Challenge, vous devez cependant sélectionner le mode impossible et on doit le voir sur la VOD.
Bonne chance et bon amusement :)

2493958708.author: Simple Shark
2493958708.title: The Right Triangle
2493958708.desc:
Welcome to the Right Triangle! A map that is shaped like a Right Triangle, I mean it's in the name.
Gameplay:
The Goals are facing down but be careful because there's a short lip. you can't roll the ball too quickly, or it will hit the lip so take your time. Besides that, it's a standard Rocket League match.
Mutators:
Boost: Unlimited
GLHF!
